actions: Ensure color contrast of at least 4.5:1 for normal text (AA)
Aim for 7:1 contrast for enhanced readability (AAA)
Use automated tools to verify contrast ratios
Test with users with visual impairments
Add alt text to all images missing alt attributes
Use empty alt='' for purely decorative images
Ensure alt text describes image content and function
Avoid using filenames or placeholder text as alt

findings.issue: Heading hierarchy skips level: h2 to h4
findings.fix: Use proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)

actions: Add missing HTML5 landmark elements (main, nav, header, footer)
Ensure proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
Add lang attribute to html element
Use semantic elements instead of generic divs

next_actions: Add missing HTML5 landmark elements (main, nav, header, footer)
Ensure proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
Add lang attribute to html element
Use semantic elements instead of generic divs

personality_analysis.guardian: 🛡️  Found 1 accessibility issues. Critical items must be addressed to ensure all users can access content.
personality_analysis.pragmatist: 🔧 WCAG compliance impacts SEO and legal requirements. Estimated fix time: 100 minutes. Focus on Level AA for industry standard.
personality_analysis.architect: 🏗️  1 areas need architectural attention. Consider baking WCAG checks into CSS Engine generation.
personality_analysis.visionary: 🚀 Accessibility enhances design for everyone. Future: AI-powered alt text generation and real-time WCAG validation.

findings.issue: Heading hierarchy skips level: h2 to h4
findings.fix: Use proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)

businessImpact: User base excludes people with disabilities
recommendations: Add missing HTML5 landmark elements (main, nav, header, footer)
Ensure proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
Add lang attribute to html element
Use semantic elements instead of generic divs
legalRisks: Non-compliance with WCAG may expose to legal action
userExperienceImpact: Navigation may be difficult without mouse
